title: Bug 14197: Unexpected Behavior When Removing a Working Set
description: When removing a working set, changes are applied immediately, which is not the expected behavior.
OB: After creating a working set with one project and selecting it, the package view is filtered as expected.
EB: The expected behavior is that when removing a working set, changes should not be applied immediately. Instead, the package view should return to its previous state, unfiltered by the working set.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a working set with one project.
2. Select the working set to filter the package view.
3. Attempt to remove the working set.
